hints.content:
To find how long the $\blueE{\text{silly string}}$ and $\maroonD{\text{magic scarf}}$ are together, we need to find the total.  So, we add.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3b325aa071c5ffd1fe59cbd9b040878361b7f535)

$\blueE{52}\text{ cm}+\maroonD{28}\text { cm} = \purpleD{\Large\Box}$

Let's add to find the total.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2215874a539fd1d5bab24e82eabf97a6a5b3336c)

$\blueE{52}\text{ cm}  + \maroonD{28}\text{ cm} =\purpleD{80}\text{ cm}$
The silly string and magic scarf combined are $\purpleD{80}\text{ cm}$ long.

question.content:

**How long are the clown's silly string and magic scarf combined?**
